text:
142 to 158 Morningstar Road, west side, south from Innis Street. The 2-story brick building has "Bodine's Big Store" inscribed within the semicircular part of the cornice.

March 24, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.

145 Morningstar Road, at the S.E. corner of Innis Street (left), showing the home of the Polish Savings and Loan Association.

March 24, 1928

P. L. Sperr

(1) Morningstar Road, east side, between Innis and La Salle Streets, showing the Elm Park station of the Staten Island Railroad. Directly over the station was later erected the Bayonne Bridge. March 24, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) A view of the station from the opposite direction (viewed westward from near Newark Ave.). May 22, 1929.

P. L. Sperr.

(3) The Elm Park railroad station some years later and part of the Bayonne Bridge running directly above the station between Morningstar Road and Newark Ave. May 19, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.
